position.marginalia_text: Dictio, Comer risoon, prima[m] designat natura[e] materia[m]. Ha[e]c, Muchabelim, Recipientes. Ista vero, Gophris, sulphur naturale Haec, Chesseph hai, Argentum viuum minerale Et ha[e]c, Ithocodut horucot, Vnione[m] spirituum: quod idem est quod ovoru[m] Gallinaru[m] Albumen naturale. Hac ista, Dovor echad, rem vna[m] solam. qua[e] est Argilla cruda simplex. Jud vero pro Aere ponitur, et inter chabalisticos numeros, decima[m] sibi vendicat quotatione[m] He primis, de Elementis exprimit Aqua[m] scilicet, et de numeris quinq[ue] Voph autem Ignem, et de numeris sex. He ista et vltima terra[m] ostendit, et de numeris quinq[ue] Quae

marginalia.translation: Vocabulary Chomerisson, which means the prime matter of nature Muchabelim, the receivers. Gophrit, natural sulphur Ithochodut horucot, a union of the spirits, that is, the white of hen's egg Dovor echad, the one sole thing, siple crude clay Yod - it is put into air and among chabalistic numbers, it claims for itself ten quotations He - it squeezes water out about the first elements, that is, about the first numbers Waw - but the fire, and about the number six He - this and the last reveals the earth and about the numbers.
